#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
#define int long long
long long error[100005];

#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define ll long long
inline ll rd()
{
  ll x=0;
  int sign=1;
  char c;
  while(((c=gc())<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-');
  if(c=='-')
    sign=-1,c=gc();
  while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
   x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+c-48,c=gc();
return sign*x;
}
 
 


main()
{
	int t;
	t=rd();
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,q;
		n=rd();
		q=rd();
		
		//memset(error,0,sizeof(error));
		for(int i=0;i<=100004;i++)
			error[i]=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			int a,b;
			a=rd();
			b=rd();
            error[a]+=1;
            error[b+1]-=1;

		}
		for(int i=0;i<100005;i++)
			error[i+1]+=error[i];
		while(q--)
		{
			int r;
			r=rd();
			printf("%lld\n",error[r]);
		}
	}
return 0;
}
